blogPost.title: Happy First Post
blogPost.description: Today I am writing my very first post on my new created blog.

blogPost.title: Got A Puppy!
blogPost.description: Got a french bulldog for Christmas! We named him Bruno and I already love him so much. He's such a good boy!!

blogPost.title: Here Alone For Now
blogPost.description: Husband left for work and we won't be united again until spring time. It's sad but I am excited for this upcoming adventure.
